derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin (first word of the Mass), accusative of requies 'rest'

entry.def: A requiem or a requiem mass is a Catholic church service in memory of someone who has recently died.
A requiem is a piece of music for singers and musicians that can be performed either as part of a requiem mass or as part of a concert.

means.word_mean: 1. a song or hymn of mourning composed or performed as a memorial to a dead person
